summary: A command‑line utility that fine‑tunes diffusion models (e.g., Stable Diffusion) using the DreamBooth approach. It prepares instance and class image datasets, tokenizes textual prompts, configures training with Accelerate, runs the optimization loop with periodic validation image generation, and saves the adapted model and accompanying documentation.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use workflow for customizing text‑to‑image generation models with user‑specific concepts, enabling creators and enterprises to generate personalized imagery without training a model from scratch.
